name: CTFontFormat
desc: The recognized format of the font.

items.name: case unrecognized
items.desc: The font is not a recognized format.

items.name: case openTypePostScript
items.desc: The font is an OpenType format containing PostScript data.

items.name: case openTypeTrueType
items.desc: The font is an OpenType format containing TrueType data.

items.name: case trueType
items.desc: The font is a recognized TrueType format.

items.name: case postScript
items.desc: The font is a recognized PostScript format.

items.name: case bitmap
items.desc: The font is a bitmap-only format.
